attributes.action: Stop the witch-hunt against two of the BBC's top talent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On Saturday, October 18, Russell Brand and Jonathan Ross broadcast a questionable series of voicemail messages directed towards Andrew Sachs.  Most of the intended audience expect to hear this kind of thing, all of them have the ability to 'switch it off'.  

Why then are the two subjected to a backlash of the magnitude experienced, it is time for it to end, and for it to be recognised as another typical tabloid incited 'up-roar'.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
